santa-claus-village.title: Santa Claus Village
santa-claus-village.description: Santa Claus Village is an amusement park in Rovaniemi in the Lapland region of Finland.

santa-claus-office.title: Santa Claus office
santa-claus-office.description: A Santa Claus's Office is located inside the main building of the Village, for visitors to take photographs and chat with the Santa Claus. However, there is an "office hour" for the Santa Claus and he may not be in the office all the time even when the Village is open.

santa-claus-main-post-office.title: Santa Claus Main Post Office
santa-claus-main-post-office.description: A large variety of Christmas related items, Christmas cards and CDs are sold in the post office. All mail sent from this post office is postmarked with a special Santa Claus postmark.
